Body:
Description: HI,

I’m having some trouble getting access to the customer portal, when do a password reset, I don’t get any email in my mailbox. I have checked my work email scanner and filter and the emails aren’t being blocked. I want to get on portal to get latest patches and downloads.

 

Regards

Paul

Paul Salisbury
Classified Systems Engineer
BAE Systems Digital Intelligence
Next Steps Updated: Spoke with Cristian. He will check to see who can assist here.
